faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about buying at GT AutoMarket.
faq.q1: What documents do I need to buy a vehicle?
faq.a1: ID card, proof of income or employment certification, credit history if applicable, and proof of address. For companies, chamber of commerce and tax ID.
faq.q2: Do you offer financing and what are the terms?
faq.a2: Yes, we work with partner entities. Typical terms between 24 and 72 months, with variable rates depending on profile. We advise you on the best plan for your case.
faq.q3: Can I schedule a test drive?
faq.a3: Of course. You can schedule from the "Visit" page or contact us via WhatsApp. We coordinate date, location and available model.
faq.q4: Do the vehicles come with warranty?
faq.a4: Yes. New vehicles with manufacturer warranty; pre-owned with limited warranty covering main mechanical components. Check terms by model.
faq.q5: Do you accept used vehicles as trade-in?
faq.a5: Yes, we do professional appraisal and you can use your vehicle as part of the deal. The offer depends on condition, history and market.
faq.a6: Vehicle selection, verification, reservation (optional), financing or payment, registration/transfer procedures and delivery with checklist and documentation.
faq.a7: You can reserve with a refundable deposit within defined timeframes if the purchase is not completed. The reservation guarantees temporary availability.
faq.q8: Do you ship to other cities?
faq.a8: Yes. We coordinate insured transport and procedures. Costs vary by destination and vehicle type.
faq.q9: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a9: Bank transfer, deposit, cards (depending on amount), mixed payments and financing with partner banks.
faq.q10: How can I contact after-sales support?
faq.a10: Through our contact form, WhatsApp or dedicated line. You can also schedule maintenance at our locations.
